      • m1

        private OnClickListener m1
        The listener for the place button. Start the next activity: Search places.

      • m2

        The listener for the person button. Start the next activity: Search people.

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

        Called when the activity is destroyed.

      • onPause

        protected void onPause()
        Called when the activity is paused.

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()
        Called when the activity is resumed. Set the buttons of the activity.

      • setButtons

        private void setButtons()
        Set the button's click listeners.

      • nextScreen

        private void nextScreen(int i)
        Start the next activity. The parameter passed indicate the next activity: search places (1), people (2), facilities (3) or the navigation mode(4).
        Parameters:
        i - The option to select the next screen.
